attributes.title: Unfathomably Horrendous
attributes.review: I have no words to describe how absolutely putrid this app is. They do not privatise your data in the slightest, and this results in constant website ads, YouTube commercials, and emails from the Trump administration. They have stolen my data and completely overtaken the platforms that I use on a day to day basis, like Google and social media. Along with being forced to see President Trump's face plastered upon all of my devices like Big Brother in 1984, this app has led to my phone crashing numerous times since I've downloaded it. I would give this zero stars if I could.

attributes.title: This app ruined my life DONâ€™T get it :(
attributes.review: I am SO disappointed with this app. I was really excited to download it after I saw it was the #1 app in News on the App Store, because we ALL know that a campaign app for the president thatâ€™s trying to get elected to a second term has all the best unbiased & up-to-date information on current Global news and happenings on a day to day basis! Given this information, plus my undying love and worship for DonDon â€“ hehehe my cute little nickname I gave our handsome president ğŸ¤£ â€“ I downloaded it IMMEDIATELY. This was the start of my troubles. I had to delete ALL my other apps in order for this one to even completely download, even the app that stored the only pictures I have of my late grandma. All the rest burned in a house fire last year and I donâ€™t remember my password to my account so those pictures are lost forever â€“ RIP Grandma ğŸ’”. I was determined to help Trumps campaign though so after it finally downloaded (took about 38 days), I opened the app and signed up! Right when I signed in to my account, my email/text messages/social media apps were BOMBARDED with ads for Donaldâ€™s exclusive line of spray tan called â€œCheeto Dust Delightâ€. I also received around 375 emails regarding toupee coupons and for some reason my YouTube would only allow me to watch videos regarding proper toupee application & maintenance. Weird right?ğŸ˜³ At this point I was feeling pretty frustrated because I was just trying to be a good citizen & support our non racist, non homophobic, and non sexist president! BUT THEN when I tried to log in to the app the next day, I received a blocked phone call. I answered and it was FREAKING President Trump himselfğŸ˜ğŸ¥ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸! To say I was honored would be an understatement, but I had no idea what was coming. Apparently, the FBI and CIA were able to use the app to hack into all of my accounts and steal my personal private data. After reviewing all my information, they discovered that I had posted a black square on my Instagram for #blackouttuesday and texted FLOYD to 55156. This did not please them at all. Trump went on to call me a â€œfat and unattractive womanâ€ who served no purpose on earth because I wasnâ€™t pretty and canâ€™t have children â€“ donâ€™t really know how they got my medical records?ğŸ¤¯ğŸ“‘ğŸ“Š He finished the phone call by saying that I was a disgrace to Christians everywhere & the great Republican state of Texas (where I live) because I support the BLM movement and donâ€™t own a gun.
